resources.string: The objective of the game is to get from the start to the goal (G).
From the current numbered cell, you can move that exact number of cells horizontally or vertically in a straight line.
Suppose we move to blank. The next move options are here or there.

There is always a way to reach the goal position, no matter which position you reach. Restarts are not necessary. \n\n After solving each maze, you will be able to compare how many moves you made to the minimum number of moves possible, and can replay the game if you wish.

About 

 Project Manager: Lorin Rumberger 

 GUI: Tim Cook and Lee Sieger 

 Activities and Navigation: Luke Burtch and Anh Nguyen 

 Maze Logic: Erin Brady 

 Sounds: Gloria Mendoza 

 Tutorial: Phoebe Eng
